Definition.WordDefinition: Charles n 1: the eldest son of Elizabeth II and heir to the English throne (born in 1948) [syn: {Prince Charles}] 2: French physicist and uathor of Charles's law which anticipated Gay-Lussac's law (1746-1823) [syn: {Jacques Charles}, {Jacques Alexandre Cesar Charles}] 3: a river in eastern Massachusetts that empties into Boston Harbor and that separates Cambridge from Boston [syn: {Charles River}]
